response: the responsibility of protecting personal information lies in the hands of both individuals and companies. individuals should take care of their own data, ensuring that they only share necessary information and managing their online privacy settings. companies, on the other hand, must prioritize the security of user data and ensure that it is not misused or sold to third parties without explicit consent. there are also legal frameworks in place, such as the gdpr in europe, which aim to protect individual rights regarding personal data. overall, both individuals and companies have a responsibility to ensure the protection of personal information.<|endoftext|>
